title: Employment Agreement

obligations.description: serve as Senior Software Engineer and fulfill responsibilities including developing enterprise-level applications, mentoring junior developers, and making architectural decisions
provide compensation and benefits as stated in the agreement

special_terms: Confidentiality of all proprietary information must be maintained
Non-compete period of 12 months post-employment within 100-mile radius of headquarters
termination_conditions: Either party may terminate with 30 days written notice
Severance of 3 months base salary upon termination without cause
Termination for cause includes breach of confidentiality, gross negligence, or policy violation
